Uses of Class
com.turo.pushy.apns.auth.ApnsSigningKey

  • Packages that use ApnsSigningKey 
    Package Description
    com.turo.pushy.apns
    Contains classes and interfaces for interacting with the Apple Push Notification service (APNs).
    com.turo.pushy.apns.auth
    Contains classes for working with APNs keys.

    • Uses of ApnsSigningKey in com.turo.pushy.apns

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ApnsClientBuilder ApnsClientBuilder.setSigningKey​(ApnsSigningKey signingKey)
      Sets the signing key for the client under construction.

      Constructors in com.turo.pushy.apns.auth with parameters of type ApnsSigningKey 
      Constructor Description
      AuthenticationToken​(ApnsSigningKey signingKey, Date issuedAt)
      Constructs a new authentication token using the given signing key (and associated metadata) issued at the given date.
